connector.description: Read and write from/to Infinispan distributed key/value store and data grid.

camel.source.path.cacheName.name: camel.source.path.cacheName
camel.source.path.cacheName.description: The name of the cache to use. Use current to use the existing cache name from the currently configured cached manager. Or use default for the default cache manager name.

camel.source.endpoint.bridgeErrorHandler.name: camel.source.endpoint.bridgeErrorHandler
camel.source.endpoint.bridgeErrorHandler.description: Allows for bridging the consumer to the Camel routing Error Handler, which mean any exceptions occurred while the consumer is trying to pickup incoming messages, or the likes, will now be processed as a message and handled by the routing Error Handler. By default the consumer will use the org.apache.camel.spi.ExceptionHandler to deal with exceptions, that will be logged at WARN or ERROR level and ignored.

camel.source.endpoint.clusteredListener.name: camel.source.endpoint.clusteredListener
camel.source.endpoint.clusteredListener.description: If true, the listener will be installed for the entire cluster

camel.source.endpoint.customListener.name: camel.source.endpoint.customListener
camel.source.endpoint.customListener.description: Returns the custom listener in use, if provided

camel.source.endpoint.eventTypes.name: camel.source.endpoint.eventTypes
camel.source.endpoint.eventTypes.description: Specifies the set of event types to register by the consumer.Multiple event can be separated by comma. The possible event types are: CACHE_ENTRY_ACTIVATED, CACHE_ENTRY_PASSIVATED, CACHE_ENTRY_VISITED, CACHE_ENTRY_LOADED, CACHE_ENTRY_EVICTED, CACHE_ENTRY_CREATED, CACHE_ENTRY_REMOVED, CACHE_ENTRY_MODIFIED, TRANSACTION_COMPLETED, TRANSACTION_REGISTERED, CACHE_ENTRY_INVALIDATED, CACHE_ENTRY_EXPIRED, DATA_REHASHED, TOPOLOGY_CHANGED, PARTITION_STATUS_CHANGED, PERSISTENCE_AVAILABILITY_CHANGED

camel.source.endpoint.sync.name: camel.source.endpoint.sync
camel.source.endpoint.sync.description: If true, the consumer will receive notifications synchronously

camel.source.endpoint.exceptionHandler.name: camel.source.endpoint.exceptionHandler
camel.source.endpoint.exceptionHandler.description: To let the consumer use a custom ExceptionHandler. Notice if the option bridgeErrorHandler is enabled then this option is not in use. By default the consumer will deal with exceptions, that will be logged at WARN or ERROR level and ignored.

camel.source.endpoint.exchangePattern.name: camel.source.endpoint.exchangePattern
camel.source.endpoint.exchangePattern.description: Sets the exchange pattern when the consumer creates an exchange. One of: [InOnly] [InOut] [InOptionalOut]

camel.source.endpoint.cacheContainer.name: camel.source.endpoint.cacheContainer
camel.source.endpoint.cacheContainer.description: Specifies the cache Container to connect

camel.source.endpoint.cacheContainerConf.name: camel.source.endpoint.cacheContainerConfiguration
camel.source.endpoint.cacheContainerConf.description: The CacheContainer configuration. Used if the cacheContainer is not defined.

camel.source.endpoint.configurationUri.name: camel.source.endpoint.configurationUri
camel.source.endpoint.configurationUri.description: An implementation specific URI for the CacheManager

camel.source.endpoint.flags.name: camel.source.endpoint.flags
camel.source.endpoint.flags.description: A comma separated list of org.infinispan.context.Flag to be applied by default on each cache invocation

camel.source.endpoint.remappingFunction.name: camel.source.endpoint.remappingFunction
camel.source.endpoint.remappingFunction.description: Set a specific remappingFunction to use in a compute operation.

camel.source.endpoint.resultHeader.name: camel.source.endpoint.resultHeader
camel.source.endpoint.resultHeader.description: Store the operation result in a header instead of the message body. By default, resultHeader == null and the query result is stored in the message body, any existing content in the message body is discarded. If resultHeader is set, the value is used as the name of the header to store the query result and the original message body is preserved. This value can be overridden by an in message header named: CamelInfinispanOperationResultHeader

camel.component.infinispan-embedded.brid.name: camel.component.infinispan-embedded.bridgeErrorHandler
camel.component.infinispan-embedded.brid.description: Allows for bridging the consumer to the Camel routing Error Handler, which mean any exceptions occurred while the consumer is trying to pickup incoming messages, or the likes, will now be processed as a message and handled by the routing Error Handler. By default the consumer will use the org.apache.camel.spi.ExceptionHandler to deal with exceptions, that will be logged at WARN or ERROR level and ignored.

camel.component.infinispan-embedded.clus.name: camel.component.infinispan-embedded.clusteredListener
camel.component.infinispan-embedded.clus.description: If true, the listener will be installed for the entire cluster

camel.component.infinispan-embedded.cust.name: camel.component.infinispan-embedded.customListener
camel.component.infinispan-embedded.cust.description: Returns the custom listener in use, if provided

camel.component.infinispan-embedded.even.name: camel.component.infinispan-embedded.eventTypes
camel.component.infinispan-embedded.even.description: Specifies the set of event types to register by the consumer.Multiple event can be separated by comma. The possible event types are: CACHE_ENTRY_ACTIVATED, CACHE_ENTRY_PASSIVATED, CACHE_ENTRY_VISITED, CACHE_ENTRY_LOADED, CACHE_ENTRY_EVICTED, CACHE_ENTRY_CREATED, CACHE_ENTRY_REMOVED, CACHE_ENTRY_MODIFIED, TRANSACTION_COMPLETED, TRANSACTION_REGISTERED, CACHE_ENTRY_INVALIDATED, CACHE_ENTRY_EXPIRED, DATA_REHASHED, TOPOLOGY_CHANGED, PARTITION_STATUS_CHANGED, PERSISTENCE_AVAILABILITY_CHANGED

camel.component.infinispan-embedded.sync.name: camel.component.infinispan-embedded.sync
camel.component.infinispan-embedded.sync.description: If true, the consumer will receive notifications synchronously

camel.component.infinispan-embedded.auto.name: camel.component.infinispan-embedded.autowiredEnabled
camel.component.infinispan-embedded.auto.description: Whether autowiring is enabled. This is used for automatic autowiring options (the option must be marked as autowired) by looking up in the registry to find if there is a single instance of matching type, which then gets configured on the component. This can be used for automatic configuring JDBC data sources, JMS connection factories, AWS Clients, etc.

camel.component.infinispan-embedded.cach.name: camel.component.infinispan-embedded.cacheContainer
camel.component.infinispan-embedded.cach.description: Specifies the cache Container to connect

camel.component.infinispan-embedded.cach.name: camel.component.infinispan-embedded.cacheContainerConfiguration
camel.component.infinispan-embedded.cach.description: The CacheContainer configuration. Used if the cacheContainer is not defined.

camel.component.infinispan-embedded.conf.name: camel.component.infinispan-embedded.configurationUri
camel.component.infinispan-embedded.conf.description: An implementation specific URI for the CacheManager

camel.component.infinispan-embedded.flag.name: camel.component.infinispan-embedded.flags
camel.component.infinispan-embedded.flag.description: A comma separated list of org.infinispan.context.Flag to be applied by default on each cache invocation

camel.component.infinispan-embedded.rema.name: camel.component.infinispan-embedded.remappingFunction
camel.component.infinispan-embedded.rema.description: Set a specific remappingFunction to use in a compute operation.

camel.component.infinispan-embedded.resu.name: camel.component.infinispan-embedded.resultHeader
camel.component.infinispan-embedded.resu.description: Store the operation result in a header instead of the message body. By default, resultHeader == null and the query result is stored in the message body, any existing content in the message body is discarded. If resultHeader is set, the value is used as the name of the header to store the query result and the original message body is preserved. This value can be overridden by an in message header named: CamelInfinispanOperationResultHeader
